nodes.text: The Christophsian rebels were a resistance group active during the Clone Wars on the planet Christophsis. The rebels combated the Separatist Droid Army during the Separatist Alliance's invasion of the planet. By the time the Galactic Republic arrived, the rebels had been nearly wiped out and had been pushed back to the eastern exurbs. The rebels were equipped with DC-15A blaster carbines.
